IncidentSuppNarrative.NarrativeText: *Maryland State Police Frederick Barrack* *Black Marked Patrol Vehicle B-4* Case Number: 23-MSP-017540 Date: 05/18/2023 Time: 1201 hours Location: 8731 Green Valley Rd., Union Bridge, MD 21776 CAMERAS: text-align:justify; margin-left:8px">TFC Carter Dash Camera (not utilized), In Car (not utilized) and Body Worn (utilized) ATTACHMENTS: text-align:justify; margin-left:8px">Venmo Emails text-align:justify; margin-left:8px">Bank Statements VICTIM / COMPLAINANT: Victim #1 Tina Michelle Kelsey DOB 09/02/1971 W/F 8731 Green Valley Rd., Union Bridge, MD 21776 240-439-5697 Victim #2 Kerrin Nicole Kelsey DOB 06/21/2004 W/F 8731 Green Valley Rd., Union Bridge, MD 21776 Trooper First Class K. Carter #6361 Maryland State Police Frederick Barrack 110 Airport Drive East Frederick, Maryland 21701 301-600-4150 SUSPECT: Suspect #1 Tomas Jones WITNESS: None SCENE PROCESSING: None NARRATIVE: On Wednesday, May 17, 2023 at approximately 1408 hours, I, TFC K. Carter #6361, was dispatched to a reported theft/fraud. Upon arriving, I contacted Victim #1, Tina Kelsey. She advised her daughter, Victim #2, Kerrin Kelsey, Venmo account had been accessed. Tina Kelsey stated there were three transactions Kerrin Kelsey did not conduct. The three transactions transferred money to a Tomas Jones. The values were of various amounts with one being $230. The transfers occurred between May 1 and May 10, 2023. Tomas Jones account shows a location in Hurlock, MD. Tina Kelsey showed me screenshots of Kerrin Kelseys Venmo friends list and that it did not include Tomas Jones. She further added that Kerrin Kelsey did not know Tomas Jones. Due to these transfers it caused the associated bank account, with WesBanco, to be overdrawn three times. Both Kelseys are the account holders. CHARGES: text-align:justify; margin-left:8px">Theft: $100 to under $1,500 CR 7-104 CJIS 1_1137 All the above events occurred in Frederick County, Maryland. Case Status: Open.

*Maryland State Police Frederick Barrack* *Black Marked Patrol Vehicle B-4* Case Number: 23MSP017540 Date: 05/18/2023 Time: 1201 hours Location: 8731 Green Valley Rd., Union Bridge, MD 21776 ATTACHMENTS: text-align:justify; margin-left:8px">MSP 67 Chain of Custody VICTIM / COMPLAINANT: Victim #1 Tina Michelle Kelsey DOB 09/02/1971 W/F 8731 Green Valley Rd., Union Bridge, MD 21776 240-439-5697 Victim #2 Kerrin Nicole Kelsey DOB 06/21/2004 W/F 8731 Green Valley Rd., Union Bridge, MD 21776 Trooper First Class K. Carter #6361 Maryland State Police Frederick Barrack 110 Airport Drive East Frederick, Maryland 21701 301-600-4150 SUSPECT: Suspect #1 Dario James Belizaire DOB 02/13/2004 B/M 302 Mulberry St., Hurlock, MD 21643 Suspect #2 Emily Catherine Lilly DOB 02/12/2000 W/F 22 Ebbtide Ct., Berlin, MD 21811 WITNESS: None SCENE PROCESSING: None NARRATIVE: On Friday, June 23, 2023, at approximately 1050 hours, I, TFC K. Carter #6361, received the return of service from Venmo. I received information for 3 accounts, 74889424, 132019814, and 142212839. All files were burned onto a CD then placed on property according to MSP policy and procedures. Account number 74889424 is listed to the victim, Kerrin Kelsey, 240-439-7152, tmkkerrinkelsey@gmail.com. The account was opened on 02/26/2020 with an open status and account type as individual. The address listed is hers above. The account only has one listed device being used. The three disputed transaction were May 5, 2023 for $230.00 and $36.00 and on May 9, 2023 for $221.00. Total amount of $487.00. All three transactions were sent to the same seller Dario Belizaire, account number 142212839, email __84501da9d5424a619703c7408aac038e+unset@venmo.com. The payment type for all transactions were listed as Goods and Services. The first transaction was at 0633 hours on May 5th, for $36.00 and had a note of a money emoji to Tomas Jones. The second transaction was at 0640 hours on May 5th, for $230.00 and had a note of a money emoji to shifty. These two transactions had an IP address of 136.160.97.21, out of Salisbury, MD. An open source check revealed the internet service provider was the University of Maryland. The third transaction was at 0627 hours on May 9th, for $221.00 and had a note of a money emoji to kerrin kelsey. The IP address for this last transaction was 174.192.199.150, out of Washington, DC. An open source check revealed the internet service provider was Verizon Wireless. There were 131 transactions during the requested time period. Account number 142212839 is listed to Dario Belizaire, DOB 02/13/2004, __84501da9d5424a619703c7408aac038e+unset@venmo.com. The account was opened on May 5, 2023 with an open status and an account type of unknown. The address listed is 302 Mulberry St., Hurlock, MD 21643. The account does not list a phone number. The social security number listed is 218-69-8845. The account does not show any listed device being used. The same three transactions from above show up on the transaction record plus additional five transactions. Two of the five transactions were listed as Business Profile Balance Transfer to account number 132019814, account holder Dario Belizaire. There were not notes for these two transactions. The last three transactions were listed as Business Profile Fee to account number 227342, no account holder name. The note for these transactions were listed as Fee payment. The amount transferred from Kerrin Kelsey account, $487.00, was then depleted to pay the fees and transferred to Dario Belizaire other account, 132019814. Account number 132019814 is listed to times jones, DOB 02/13/2004, 410-443-7155, elilly1@gulls.salisbury.edu. The account was opened on September 12, 2022 with an open status and an account type of individual. The address listed is 302 Mulberry St., Hurlock, MD 21643. The social security number listed is 218-69-8845. A second email listed is kiddario21@gmail.com. The account only has one listed device being used. There are only three transaction during the requested time frame. Two are the transfers in from the above account, 142212839. The last one was for $450.00, payment to Iam Wrexx with a note of Tattoo. During my initial interview with Tina Kelsey she stated her daughter Kerrin Kelsey was in her first year at Salisbury University. I called Salisbury University for some background infromation. They confirmed Kerrin Kelsey was a student in her sophomore year, as a Management major and lived in Chester Hall this past year, 2022-2023. They advised Dario Belizaire was a student in his sophomore year based on time, but credit wise a freshman. He is on academic probation due to grades and doesnt have a declared major. He lived in Choptank Hall. They were able to advised the owner of elilly1@gulls.salisbury.edu is Emily Catherine Lilly (DOB 02/12/2000 W/F). She graduated as with a Marketing degree in May of 2023. She did live on campus this last year, 2022-2023, in Chester Hall. Salisbury advised it would require printing out their schedules to determine if they had any classes together. CHARGES: text-align:justify; margin-left:8px">Theft: $100 to under $1,500 CR 7-104 CJIS 1_1137 All the above events occurred in Frederick County, Maryland. Case Status: Open.

*Maryland State Police Frederick Barrack* *Black Marked Patrol Vehicle B-4* Case Number: 23MSP017540 Date: 05/18/2023 Time: 1201 hours Location: 8731 Green Valley Rd., Union Bridge, MD 21776 ATTACHMENTS: None VICTIM / COMPLAINANT: Victim #1 Tina Michelle Kelsey DOB 09/02/1971 W/F 8731 Green Valley Rd., Union Bridge, MD 21776 240-439-5697 Victim #2 Kerrin Nicole Kelsey DOB 06/21/2004 W/F 8731 Green Valley Rd., Union Bridge, MD 21776 240-439-7152 Trooper First Class K. Carter #6361 Maryland State Police Frederick Barrack 110 Airport Drive East Frederick, Maryland 21701 301-600-4150 SUSPECT: Suspect #1 Dario James Belizaire DOB 02/13/2004 B/M 302 Mulberry St., Hurlock, MD 21643 Suspect #2 Emily Catherine Lilly DOB 02/12/2000 W/F 22 Ebbtide Ct., Berlin, MD 21811 WITNESS: None SCENE PROCESSING: None NARRATIVE: On Monday, August 9, 2023, at approximately 1010 hours, I, TFC K. Carter #6361, spoke with Tina Kelsey. She advised Kerrin had forwarded her an email which brought the fraudulent transactions to her attention. She further stated Kerrin was unavailable for the rest of this week but advised she should be the week of 08/14/2023. I searched Facebook and located Kerrin Kelseys, Belizaires and Lillys accounts. Kelseys and Belizaire did not show as being friends with the other two. Lillys friends list was not accessible. On Friday, August 18, 2023 at approximately 0923 hours, I contacted Kerrin Kelsey by phone to conduct an interview. I used by body worn camera to record the interview and advised Kelsey that it was on. I asked her to verify the transactions were in question. She advised there were a large amount of transactions more then the 3 transactions I found in Venmo. Kelsey explained that she didnt not have any money in her bank account so Venmo fronted the suspects account the money. She stated the suspect made notes on the transactions of friends names and nicknames in an attempt to make the transactions appear normal. I asked her when these transactions occurred, which she advised the beginning of May. I then directed her attention to timeframe of Thursday, May 4 to Tuesday, May 9, as the transactions from Venmo occurred during that timeframe. I asked her to give a run through of where she went and who she was with during those dates. See timeline below: text-align:justify; margin-left:8px">Thursday, May 4 margin-left:8px; text-align:justify">1230-1530 was in class margin-left:8px; text-align:justify">Went back to dorm room margin-left:8px; text-align:justify">Belizaire came over sometime in the evening and spend the night text-align:justify; margin-left:8px">Friday, May 5 margin-left:8px; text-align:justify">Kelsey had later found a transaction that occurred at approximately 0230 hours in her Apple Cash that was send to Belizaire for $5.00. Kelsey made him return money. margin-left:8px; text-align:justify">Belizaire left her dorm at approximately 0630 hours for weight lighting practice margin-left:8px; text-align:justify">Class from 0900 to 1000 hours margin-left:8px; text-align:justify">Went back to dorm room to pack margin-left:8px; text-align:justify">At 1300 or 1400 hours, she left to come home Libertytown, where she spent the rest of night text-align:justify; margin-left:8px">Saturday, May 6 margin-left:8px; text-align:justify">Kelsey left at 0900 hours to go to her new house in College Park, roommates Molly, Nayeli, Cecilia margin-left:8px; text-align:justify">1100 hours went to Dage party with roommates in College Park and was there rest of the evening margin-left:8px; text-align:justify">Stayed the night at Gavin Gibsons apartment text-align:justify; margin-left:8px">Sunday, May 7 margin-left:8px; text-align:justify">1100 hours Kelsey returned house in College Park margin-left:8px; text-align:justify">Went to a birthday dinner for Adrianna from 1700 to 2200 margin-left:8px; text-align:justify">She then drove back Salisbury text-align:justify; margin-left:8px">Monday, May 8 margin-left:8px; text-align:justify">Kelsey was in her room in the morning margin-left:8px; text-align:justify">1100 hours she had class margin-left:8px; text-align:justify">Then she went back to her dorm room margin-left:8px; text-align:justify">1500 hours she had class margin-left:8px; text-align:justify">Then went back to dorm room to study margin-left:8px; text-align:justify">Belizaire probably came over to her dorm room in the evening and she Grubhubbed dinner text-align:justify; margin-left:8px">Tuesday, May 9 margin-left:8px; text-align:justify">Kelsey was in her room in the morning margin-left:8px; text-align:justify">1230-1530 she had class, while in class she attempted to pay Chris for a t-shirt. She was unable to because her account had no money and she found the suspicious transactions. margin-left:8px; text-align:justify">After class she called her mom and the bank. margin-left:8px; text-align:justify">Then went back to her dorm room margin-left:8px; text-align:justify">Spend time with Cassandra midday I asked Kelsey if she had a roommate, she stated did, McKenzie. But McKenzie stayed with her boyfriend and didnt have any belongs there nor was ever there herself. I asked Kelsey how she knew Belizaire. She stated that he was a football play and lived in the dorm next to hers. She further advised everyone left their doors open to socialize. She described their relationship as causally having sexual relations. I asked her how long Belizaire knew her password, she advised since approximately November 2022. She advised it was a really easy password, as its all the same number. I asked if she socialized with anyone else. She stated that she was friends with Ella until they had a falling out because of other friends Brie and Camille. Those three girls had a vendetta against Kelsey, whom advised she wouldnt be surprised if I advised my suspect was them. She also spent time with Cassandra. Kelsey advised everyone were freshman except Cassandra who was a sophomore. I asked if Kelsey knew Emily Lilly to which she stated no. Kelsey looked up Lilly on Instagram and determined they follow a lot of the same people. This included Justin Oats, whose nickname was Shifty, and Kelsey also spent time with. Kelsey also looked at Lilly Facebook where she could see a picture of her, Kelsey did not remember see Lilly around campus. Kelsey advised she blocked Belizaire on Facebook and Instagram when left Salisbury University. CHARGES: text-align:justify; margin-left:8px">Theft: $100 to under $1,500 CR 7-104 CJIS 1_1137 All the above events occurred in Frederick County, Maryland. Case Status: Open.

Focus of Supplemental Report: Interview - Emily Catherine Lilly Witness: Name: Emily Catherine Lilly DOB: 02/12/2000 Race: White / Sex: Female Address: 22 Ebbtide Court, Berlin, Worcester County, Maryland 21811 Phone: 443-945-7456 Evidence: One (1) recorded phone interview of Emily Catherine Lilly, stored athttps://mdsp.evidence.com/axon/evidence?evidence_id=0839020dfc22455280d9f751baddbffbpartner_id=5ed6a168304e40eb9a0cfb1a226ef1a1 Narrative: On September 22, 2023, I, Corporal Nicholas R. Hager, #6001 of the Maryland State Police Criminal Enforcement Division Eastern Region responded to 22 Ebbtide Court, Berlin, Worcester County, Maryland 21811 in an attempt to contact Emily Catherine Lilly [hereinafter referred to as Lilly]. Upon arrival, I was unable to make contact with anyone at the residence however a nearby neighbor confirmed that Lilly resides at the residence and provided the phone number 443-945-7456 for her. I responded to the Salisbury Barrack at which time I received a voicemail from Lilly. I attempted to return Lillys phone call however was unsuccessful. At approximately 1147 hours [11:47 a.m.] I received a phone call from Lilly and was able to conduct a phone interview with her. The interview was recorded with my Axon Body 3 Body worn camera. Below is a synopsis of the interview and not a transcript therefore some paraphrasing may be used: Lilly does not know who Kerrin Kelsey is Lilly does not know who Dario Belizaire is Lilly does not know who Tomas Jones is Lilly said she would be more familiar with pictures rather than names because she didnt have many friends in college Lilly identified the email address elilly1@gulls.salisbury.edu as her email account Lilly has since graduated from Salisbury University Lilly searched her phone for the phone number 410-443-7155 and said she was unfamiliar with the number Lilly is unfamiliar with the address 302 Mulberry St, Hurlock Maryland 21643 Lillys social security number is not 218-69-8845 Lilly is also unfamiliar with the email address kiddario21@gmail.com Lilly searched her email account for any emails in reference to Venmo however did not locate any Lilly is familiar with the name shifty Lilly identified shifty as Justin Oates Lilly said Justin Oatesis currently still attending Salisbury University Case open, investigation continuing.

IncidentSuppNarrative.NarrativeTitle: Contact with Salisbury University Police Ref. Justin Oates
IncidentSuppNarrative.NarrativeText: Focus of Supplemental Report: Contact with Salisbury University Police Ref. Justin Oates Narrative: On September 22, 2023, I, Corporal Nicholas R. Hager, #6001 of the Maryland State Police Criminal Enforcement Division Eastern Region contacted the Salisbury University Police Department and obtained the following information in reference to Justin Oates: Name: Justin Oates DOB: 04/24/2001 Phone: 919-649-3310 919-649-5377 I was informed that Justin Oates is currently attending Salisbury University however the Police Department did not have a current address for him. I conducted a check of the Maryland Motor Vehicle Administration and located one (1) Justin Oates and obtained the following information: Driver Authorization ID: MD10272589234 Name: Justin Wilbert Oates DOB: 04/24/2001 Height: 602 Weight: 173 Race: Black Gender: Male Address: 7200 Alden Way Apt. 3038, Hanover, MD 21076 Case open, investigation continuing.

*Maryland State Police Frederick Barrack* *Black Marked Patrol Vehicle B-4* Case Number: 23-MSP-017540 Date: 05/18/2023 Time: 1201 hours Location: 8731 Green Valley Rd., Union Bridge, MD 21776 CAMERAS: text-align:justify; margin-left:8px">TFC Carter Dash Camera (not utilized), In Car (not utilized) and Body Worn (not utilized) ATTACHMENTS: text-align:justify; margin-left:8px">Subpoena to Green Dot text-align:justify; margin-left:8px">Green Dot Custodian of Records text-align:justify; margin-left:8px">Green Dot Account Information text-align:justify; margin-left:8px">Green Dot Transaction History VICTIM / COMPLAINANT: Victim #1 Tina Michelle Kelsey DOB 09/02/1971 W/F 8731 Green Valley Rd., Union Bridge, MD 21776 240-439-5697 Victim #2 Kerrin Nicole Kelsey DOB 06/21/2004 W/F 8731 Green Valley Rd., Union Bridge, MD 21776 240-439-7152 Senior Trooper K. Carter #6361 Maryland State Police Frederick Barrack 110 Airport Drive East Frederick, Maryland 21701 301-600-4150 SUSPECT: Suspect #1 Dario James Belizaire DOB 02/13/2004 B/M 302 Mulberry St., Hurlock, MD 21643 NARRATIVE: During the interview with Kerrin Kelsey, she explained that she located Apple Cash transactions from her phone to Dario Belizaire. She saw that he attempted to make two large transfers and was successful in a smaller, $5.00, transfer. On Wednesday, September 20, 2023 at approximately 0857 hours, I, TFC K. Carter #6361, I obtained a subpoena for transactions information for Apple Cash of Kerrin Kelsey account, associated with phone number 240-439-7152. The subpoena was for and submitted to Green Dot Corporation later that day. On Friday, September 22, 2023 at approximately 1836 hours, I received the account information and transaction history from Green Dot Corporation. The account listed Kerrin Kelsey as the owner. I had requested a time frame of 05/03/2023 to 05/05/2023, during which there were 3 transactions. All three transactions occurred on 05/04/2023 within a couple minutes, 2323 hours to 2324 hours (PST). The first two transaction were for $300.00 and $100.00, respectively, which both failed. The last transaction was for $6.00 and was successful. All 3 transactions were going to account number 3630608335677456, owned by Dario Belizaire. CHARGES: text-align:justify; margin-left:8px">Theft: $100 to under $1,500 CR 7-104 CJIS 1_1137 All the above events occurred in Frederick County, Maryland. Case Status: Open, further investigation.

*Maryland State Police Frederick Barrack* *Black Marked Patrol Vehicle B-4* Case Number: 23-MSP-017540 Date: 05/18/2023 Time: 1201 hours Location: 8731 Green Valley Rd., Union Bridge, MD 21791 ATTACHMENTS: None VICTIM / COMPLAINANT: Victim #1 Tina Michelle Kelsey DOB 09/02/1971 W/F 8731 Green Valley Rd., Union Bridge, MD 21791 240-439-5697 Victim #2 Kerrin Nicole Kelsey DOB 06/21/2004 W/F 8731 Green Valley Rd., Union Bridge, MD 21791 SUSPECT: Suspect #1 Dario James Belizaire DOB 02/13/2004 B/M 302 Mulberry St., Hurlock, MD 21643 WITNESS: None SCENE PROCESSING: None NARRATIVE: On Wednesday, May 17, 2023 at approximately 1408 hours, I, ST K. Carter #6361, was dispatched to a reported theft/fraud. I contacted Victim #1, Tina Kelsey, whom advised her daughter, Victim #2, Kerrin Kelsey, Venmo account had been accessed. Tina Kelsey stated there were three transaction Kerrin Kelsey did not conduct. The Venmo app showed the three transactions transferred money to a Tomas Jones with a username of @Ytn_1. The Venmo transactions caused the associated WesBanco bank account to be overdrawn and incurred overdraft fees. Both Tina and Kerrin Kelsey are account holders on the WesBanco account and live at 8731 Green Valley Rd., Union Bridge, Frederick County, MD 21791. I submitted subpoenas to Venmo for the usernames of both Kerrin Kelsey and Tomas Jones. I received information regarding three accounts, one being Kelseys and the other two belonging to the suspect. Venmo showed suspect account 1 being held by Dario Belizaire (DOB 02/13/2004) opened on 05/05/2023. Suspect account 2 was held by times jones (DOB 02/13/2004) opened on 09/22/2022. Both accounts shared the same mailing address, social security number and date of birth. I was able to check various law enforcement databases to obtain a full name of Dario James Belizaire (DOB 02/13/2004 B/M). Review of the transaction lists from all of the accounts revealed the following. On 05/05/2023 and 05/09/2023, there were three transactions from Kerrin Kelseys account to suspect account 1. The total amount of the three transactions was $487.00. This amount was then transferred in two transactions to suspect account 2. Then there was a transaction from suspect account 2 to Iam Wrexx for an amount of $450.00 with a note of Tattoo. I then conducted a phone interview with Kerrin Kelsey. She verified the transactions in question advising it was a large sum of money compared to her normal transaction amounts. We then discussed her daily routine, events and people she was in contact with for the timeframe of 05/04/2023 to 05/9/2023. Kerrin Kelsey identified Belizaire as someone she as an intimate relationship with. She further advised they knew each other because he was a football player and she was a cheerleader. She stated Belizaire spent the night in her dorm room on 05/04/2023 to 05/05/2023 at Salisbury University. On a later date Kerrin Kelsey located a $5.00 Apple Cash transaction to Belizaire that occurred on 05/05/2023 at 0230 hours. Venmo showed two transactions between 0633 and 0640 hours on the morning of 05/05/2023. Kerrin Kelsey advised Belizaire left for weight lifting practice at approximately 0630 hours. Again on 05/09/2023, Kerrin Kelsey believed Belizaire also spent the night in her dorm room. The third transaction occurred on 05/09/2023 at 0627 hours. Kerrin Kelsey advised Belizaire knew the passcode to her phone since November 2022 and it was a simple passcode. Kerrin Kelsey advised Belizarie did not have consent to transfer money to himself. I obtained a subpoena for transactions information for Apple Cash of Kerrin Kelsey account, associated with phone number 240-439-7152. I received the account information and transaction history from Green Dot Corporation. The account listed Kerrin Kelsey as the owner. I had requested a time frame of 05/03/2023 to 05/05/2023, during which there were 3 transactions. All three transactions occurred on 05/04/2023 within a couple minutes, 2323 hours to 2324 hours (PST). The first two transaction were for $300.00 and $100.00, respectively, which both failed. The last transaction was for $6.00 and was successful. All 3 transactions were going to account number 3630608335677456, owned by Dario Belizaire. On 01/09/2024, I submitted an application of charges to the Frederick County Commissioners Office. The commissioner issued a criminal summons for the below charges. CED Lower Eastern Shore has made several attempts to conduct a knock and talk with Belizaire. They will continue attempt to interview Belizaire and will be forwarded the criminal summons for service. CHARGES: text-align:justify; margin-left:8px">Theft: $100 to under $1,500 CR 7-104 CJIS 1_1137 All the above events occurred in Frederick County, Maryland. Case Status: Open.
